altTitles.ja: 諸星大二郎 ナンセンスギャグ漫画集

altTitles.ja-ro: Morohoshi Daijiro Nonsense Gag Mangashuu - Chiran no Maki
Morohoshi Daijiro Nonsense Gag Mangashuu - Myou no Maki

description.en:
Short shorts by the genius Daijiro Morohoshi!!

From his debut in 1970 to the present, the genius Daijiro Morohoshi has been running through the other worlds of the Japanese manga world. His 33 works, which are extremely nonsense, will be published simultaneously in two volumes, "Unusual Volume'' and "Strange Volume''!! "Strange Volume'' includes works such as "When You Wish Upon a Star...'', which is included in a book for the first time. Contains 22 nonsense short stories
full of experimental spirit.

[Recorded works]
Strange Restaurant / Midnight Meeting / Luncheon on the Passenger Ship St. Peter / Magistrate! / A Disaster / A Story That Killed People / Coffee Shop Drifting / The Striped Man's Counterattack / The Cork Stopper A Corpse/Why is the Mailbox Red/Resurrection of the Striped Man/Cossie Tale/Mysterious Napkin/When You Wish upon a Star.../Love on the Roof/Four Panel Pretend/BUS STOP/Others/Mr. Oh's Travels/Alligator/Poison Eat it / Spicy ghost story / In the middle of the desert

Funny version
Contains a total of 11 nonsense gags that give a glimpse of Daijiro Morohoshi's mischievous side, including 4 stories.

[Recorded works]
Dojigen Sekai Monogatari/Inverted Ape Man/Ghost Stories Dragon's Footprints/Dr. Angry Mountain Digging the Bible/The Sun Rises Again/Pale Machine/Records of Mr. Nekoroku/The Cat in the General Affairs Department/Net Yokai Heaven Japan /Please insert a coin and press the button/Untitled
